amendment.description: Amendment prevents the Army Corps of Engineers from using funds to terminate or to plan to terminate any 50-year coastal storm damage reduction project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit funds to plan for termination of periodic nourishment for water resource development projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
